# Setup
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_knit$set(root.dir = ".")
```
# User defined variables
```{r set_variables}
source(here::here("scripts/R", "file_paths_and_colours.R"))
condition <- c("All_samples")
library(plotly)
tool <- "star"
min_expression <- "min_exp50"
# save contrast names
allComparisons <- c("LBDvsControl", 
                    "LBDvsAD", 
                    "LBDvsPA", 
                    "ADvsControl", 
                    "PAvsControl", 
                    "ADvsPA")
allComparisons # check
```
# Read in DEGs
Read table with all genes (FDRq = 1).
```{r read_DEG_table}
# sex as a covariate
coef <- 1
for (i in allComparisons) {
  filepath <- paste0(
    "../../results/",
    tool,
    "/DEGs/", condition, "_", min_expression, "_",
    i,
    "_gene_DEGs_FDRq1.00.txt"
  )
  assign(paste0(i),
         read.delim(
           filepath,
           header = TRUE,
           sep = "\t",
           stringsAsFactors = FALSE
         ))
  # increment
  coef <- coef + 1
}
```

```{r}
data <-
  merge(ADvsControl,
        ROSMAP_AD,
        by = "gene_name",
        all = T)
data <- data[c(1,2,6,9,10,13,17,20,23)] #data[c(1,2,6,9,10,13,22,23,26)]
colnames(data) = c("gene_name", "chr", "gene_id", "LBD_logFC", "LBD_AveExpr", "LBD_adj.P.Val", "AD_logFC", "AD_AveExpr", "AD_adj.P.Val")

data[is.na(data)] <- 0
CWOW <- subset(data, LBD_adj.P.Val <= 0.05)
ROSMAP <- subset(data, AD_adj.P.Val <= 0.05)

#data <- subset(data, AD_adj.P.Val <= 0.05 | LBD_adj.P.Val <= 0.05)
data_goi <- subset(data, 
                        (AD_logFC < -0.5 & LBD_logFC < -0.5) | 
                          (AD_logFC > .5 & LBD_logFC > 0.5) | 
                          (AD_logFC > .5 & LBD_logFC <= 0) |
                          (AD_logFC <= 0 & LBD_logFC > 0.5))

#data$difference <- data$logFC - data$gene.log2FC
ggplot(data = data, 
  aes(x = AD_logFC, y = LBD_logFC, text = paste(gene_name))) +
  annotate(
    "rect",
    xmin = 0,
    xmax = 2.75,
    ymin = 2.75,
    ymax = 0,
    fill = "lightpink3",
    alpha = .5
  ) +  annotate(
    "rect",
    xmin = 0,
    xmax = -2,
    ymin = 0,
    ymax = -2,
    fill = "cadetblue3",
    alpha = .5) +
  geom_abline(color = "gray40") +
  geom_point(size = 1) + 
  theme_bw() +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(size = 10)) +
  theme(legend.position = "none") +
  theme(axis.title.x = element_text(size = 10),
        axis.text.x = element_text(size = 10)) +
  theme(axis.title.y = element_text(size = 10),
        axis.text.y = element_text(size = 10)) +
  labs(
    title = "DEGs shared and unique between our data and Marques-Coelho 2021",
    x = expression(paste("Our data ", log[2](AD/control))),
    y = expression(paste("Marques-Coelho 2021 ", log[2](LBD/control))))+
  scale_y_continuous(breaks = seq(-1.75, 2.725, by = .5), 
                     limits = c(-2, 2.75), expand = c(0,0)) +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(-2, 2.75, by = .5), 
                     limits = c(-2, 2.75), expand = c(0,0))


# Scatter plot with correlation coefficient
sp <- ggscatter(data, x = "AD_logFC", y = "LBD_logFC",
                add = "reg.line",  # Add regressin line
                add.params = list(color = "blue", fill = "lightgray"), 
                conf.int = TRUE)
# Add correlation coefficient
sp + stat_cor(method = "pearson", label.x = -1.25, label.y = -10)
```
```{r}
data <-
  merge(LBDvsControl,
        ADvsControl,
        by = "gene_name",
        all = T)
data <- data[c(1,2,6,9,10,13,22,23,26)]
colnames(data) = c("gene_name", "chr", "gene_id", "LBD_logFC", "LBD_AveExpr", "LBD_adj.P.Val", "AD_logFC", "AD_AveExpr", "AD_adj.P.Val")

#data[is.na(data)] <- 0
#data <- na.omit(data$AD_logFC)

data <- data[!is.na(data$AD_logFC), ]  
data <- data[!is.na(data$LBD_logFC), ]  
significant_AD <- subset(data, data$LBD_adj.P.Val <= 0.05 | data$AD_adj.P.Val <= 0.05 )
significant_in_both_AD <- subset(data, data$LBD_adj.P.Val <= 0.05 & data$AD_adj.P.Val <= 0.05 )
data <- significant_in_both_AD
#data <- subset(data, AD_adj.P.Val <= 0.05 | LBD_adj.P.Val <= 0.05)
data_goi <- subset(data, 
                        (AD_logFC < -0.5 & LBD_logFC < -0.5) | 
                          (AD_logFC > .5 & LBD_logFC > 0.5) | 
                          (AD_logFC > .5 & LBD_logFC <= 0) |
                          (AD_logFC <= 0 & LBD_logFC > 0.5))


data_goi <- subset(data, 
                        (AD_logFC < -0.5 & LBD_logFC < -0.5) | 
                          (AD_logFC > .5 & LBD_logFC > 0.5) | 
                          (AD_logFC > .1 & LBD_logFC <= 0) |
                          (AD_logFC <= 0 & LBD_logFC > 0.1))

#data$difference <- data$LBD_logFC - data$AD_logFC
corr_AD <- ggplot(data = data, 
  aes(x = AD_logFC, y = LBD_logFC, text = paste(gene_name))) +
  annotate(
    "rect",
    xmin = 0,
    xmax = 2,
    ymin = 2,
    ymax = 0,
    fill = "lightpink3",
    alpha = .5
  ) +  annotate(
    "rect",
    xmin = 0,
    xmax = -2,
    ymin = 0,
    ymax = -2,
    fill = "cadetblue3",
    alpha = .5) +
  geom_abline(color = "gray40") +
  geom_text_repel(
    data = data_goi, 
    aes(
      x = AD_logFC, 
      y = LBD_logFC,
      label = gene_name
    ),
    color = "black",
    fontface = "italic",
    size = 2.5, 
    max.overlaps = getOption("ggrepel.max.overlaps", default = 40)
  ) +
  geom_point(size = 1) + 
  theme_bw() +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(size = 10)) +
  theme(legend.position = "none") +
  theme(axis.title.x = element_text(size = 10),
        axis.text.x = element_text(size = 10)) +
  theme(axis.title.y = element_text(size = 10),
        axis.text.y = element_text(size = 10)) +
  labs(
    title = "Expressed genes in both synpase ROSMAP PCC & LBD_CWOW ADvsControl",
    x = expression(paste("ROSMAP ", log[2](AD/control))),
    y = expression(paste("LBD CWOW ", log[2](AD/control))))+
  scale_y_continuous(breaks = seq(-1.75, 2, by = .5), 
                     limits = c(-2, 2), expand = c(0,0)) +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(-2, 2, by = .5),

corr_AD
```
